blockchain.name: Web 3.0 (Blockchain) and Metaverse Specialization
blockchain.content: This Web 3.0 and Metaverse specialization focuses on developing full-stack Web 3.0 and Metaverse experiences for the next generation of the internet by specializing in building worlds that merge the best of cutting-edge decentralized distributed blockchains with 3D metaverse client experiences.

genomics.name: Genomics and Bioinformatics Specialization
genomics.content: Genomics is the study of the total genetic makeup of individual organisms, and how this genetic information is structured, functions, and has evolved; bioinformatics encompasses a diverse range of analytical methods and tools applied to genomic data. This Specialization focuses on performing complex bioinformatics analysis using the most essential Python libraries and applications.

network.name: Network Programmability and Automation Specialization
network.content: More than ever, network engineers are finding it challenging to complete their duties entirely manually. Network automation is now crucial due to new protocols, technologies, delivery models, and the requirement for enterprises to become more adaptable and agile. This course teaches network engineers how to automate systems with code using a variety of technologies and tools, including Linux, Python, APIs, and Git.
